title: 我的react
text: ###代码12345678910111213141516171819202122import React from 'react';import Reflux from 'reflux';import AssociationInput from '../../components/AssociationInput/AssociationInput';let InputTest = React.createClass({ displayName: "我的测试", getInitialState(){ return { rowList:[], } }, render(){ return ( <div style={{lineHeight:"32px"}}> <AssociationInput style={{ width: 260 }} placeholder="输入关键字" notFoundContent="暂无信息" /> </div> ) }})export default InputTest; ####使用方法1<AssociationInput style={{ width: 260 }} placeholder="输入关键字" notFoundContent="暂无信息" /> ####属性style | { width: 260 …}placeholder | placeholder=”输入关键字”notFoundContent | notFoundContent=”暂无信息”size | large，small等

title: 海浪来了
text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
